sentences: Hadley was a member of The Black Sorrows from 1991 to 1993 appearing on the album Better Times (1993).
In 1998 he was part of the Singers For The Red Black & Gold who released a cover of "Yil Lull" which was nominated for the ARIA Award for Best Indigenous Release.
This earned him an ARIA Award for Best Original Soundtrack Album in 2002.
